titles.title: To authorize a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor United States citizens and legal residents who lost their lives as victims of crimes committed by individuals unlawfully present in the United States, and for other purposes.

To authorize a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor United States citizens and legal residents who lost their lives as victims of crimes committed by individuals unlawfully present in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
